data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Bampura Tschorsnig (Diptera: Tachinidae), with the description of a new species from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gilasian, Ebrahim, Ziegler, Joachim, Parchami-Araghi, Mehrdad (2019): Review of the genus Bampura Tschorsnig (Diptera: Tachinidae), with the description of a new species from Iran. Zootaxa 4585 (1): 41-58, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.1.3
